conversion_verification.notes: The conversion represents a genuine 3D isometric cutaway with clear vertical volume.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D modeling fundamentals; walls have consistent thickness and corners are mathematically sound.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major layout features like the central stairs and kitchen sink are present, but the bay window (window seat) is missing on the right, replaced by a flat wall.

interior_elements.notes: Cabinetry and sinks are placed correctly in the kitchen and WC areas, but dining furniture is absent/generic.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity render; materials are consistent and lighting provides good depth cues.

detected_errors.description: Right-side bay window/window seat geometry from the 2D plan is rendered as a standard flat wall.
Additional decorative sinks/fixtures added on the right side that are not present in the original technical drawing.

summary: A high-quality 3D transformation that preserves the core structural logic and stair placement, though it misses specific perimeter architectural features like the bay window.
